name: cartae-marketplace-api
description: Cloudflare Worker API pour le marketplace de plugins Cartae

scripts.init:bucket: wrangler r2 bucket create cartae-plugins && wrangler r2 bucket create cartae-plugins-preview
scripts.init:kv: wrangler kv:namespace create KV_STORE && wrangler kv:namespace create KV_STORE --preview

author: Cartae Team
